post_title: EPDG Eddie Collins SGC 3.5 (and a PSA 3 p350)
post_content:
All prices include shipping and insurance (within the US) and assume a no-fee payment method.  If you'd like to use Paypal Goods and Services, that's fine, just add 3.5%.  I have to collect sales tax from Washington state buyers.

EPDG $1560 SOLD

Piedmont 350 $1000 SOLD
Great price on the 350 Luke, if I didn't already have one I'd grab it in a minute.
Last price drop on EPDG.  I can't believe this hasn't sold yet.
